alert.note: Alert for Creek; Okfuskee; Okmulgee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 5:46PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Creek, northwestern Okmulgee, west central Tulsa and northwestern Okfuskee Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 545 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles west of Mounds to 5 miles south of Slick to 8 miles north of Paden. Movement was northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Bristow... Sapulpa... Mannford... Drumright... Mounds... Kellyville... Oilton... Depew... Slick... Shamrock... Keystone State Park... Silver City... Milfay... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 178 and 210. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
